title: Gold 4 Support main looking for duo partner.
body:
Gold 4 Support main looking for duo partner, i can play all supports other then blitz.....worst champion every made......

Have been plat 4 100 lp 17 times >.> 


got plat last season highest plat 4 100lp
got plat this season got plat 4 100lp lost 12 games in a row and fell from there....

I'm terrible i reckon but check my stats out 
both accounts
IGN : TCA Beausen - main - don't have anymore... got banned for being toxic and shit
